title: Zion National Park: Traveling Trunks
body: Traveling Trunks                    Dinosaur Discovery Travel Trunk Hands-on educational materials you can borrow for your class.           Results   Showing results 1-1 of 1    Sort By:  Title Date         Zion National Park Dinosaur Discovery Travel Trunk    Zionâ€™s Dinosaur Discovery Travel Trunk helps students explore the ancient environments of Utah, its geologic time scale, the formation and different types of fossils, and types of dinosaurs that lived in Utah during the Mesozoic Era.    Type:Traveling Trunk Grade level:Fourth Grade-Eighth Grade Subjects:Geology, Paleontology National/State Standards:Utah Core Curriculum Fourth Grade ScienceStandard 4: Students will understand how fossils are formed, where they may be found in Utah, and how they can be used to make inferences. Keywords:paleontology, fossils, Dinosaurs
